faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We accept returns within 24 hours of delivery for perishable items and 7 days for non-perishable items, provided they are in their original condition.

faqs.question: How can I request a return or replacement?
faqs.answer: You can request a return or replacement directly from the 'My Orders' section in the app. Select the order, choose the item, and tap 'Return/Replace'.

faqs.question: Which items are not eligible for return?
faqs.answer: Fresh fruits, vegetables, dairy products, and other perishable items are not eligible for return unless they are damaged or spoiled upon delivery.

faqs.question: Do I need the original packaging to return an item?
faqs.answer: Yes, items should be returned in their original packaging to qualify for a return or replacement, especially for non-perishable goods.

faqs.question: Can I return an item after the return window has passed?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, we cannot accept returns or replacements once the return window has expired. Please ensure you initiate the process within the allowed time frame.

faqs.question: Is there a return or pickup fee?
faqs.answer: No, we do not charge any fees for returns or replacements if the request meets our policy criteria.

faqs.question: Can I cancel a replacement request?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel a replacement request from the same order screen before it is processed for delivery.

faqs.question: Do I need to return the original item for a replacement?
faqs.answer: Yes, please hand over the original item in its delivered condition to the delivery executive during the replacement process.

faqs.question: How long does a replacement take to arrive?
faqs.answer: Replacements are typically delivered within 1–2 business days, depending on item availability and your location.

faqs.question: What happens if I’m not available during the return pickup?
faqs.answer: Our delivery executive will attempt to contact you. If the pickup fails, you can reschedule it from the app or our support team will help you arrange another time.

faqs.question: Can I return only part of a combo or bundled offer?
faqs.answer: Items bought as part of a combo or bundle can only be returned or replaced as a complete set unless individual items were delivered incorrectly or damaged.

faqs.question: The app says 'return not available' for an item. Why?
faqs.answer: Some items are marked non-returnable due to health, safety, or hygiene reasons. Check the product details for return eligibility before purchasing.

faqs.question: Can I exchange an item instead of returning it?
faqs.answer: Currently, we only support replacements for the same item. For a different product, please request a return and place a new order.

faqs.question: Can I change the address for the return pickup?
faqs.answer: Return pickups must be done from the original delivery address. Contact support for special cases.
